5597 Display * WBGetWindowDisplay(Window wID)
5598 {
5599  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
5600 
5601  if(pEntry)
5602  {
5603  return pEntry->pDisplay;
5604  }
5605 
5606  return pDefaultDisplay;
5607 }
5608 
5609 void WBSetWindowIcon(Window wID, int idIcon)
5610 {
5611  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
5612  Display *pDisp = pEntry ? pEntry->pDisplay : pDefaultDisplay;
5613 
5614  if(pEntry)
5615  {
5616  if(__internal_alloc_WMHints(pEntry))
5617  {
5618  return;
5619  }
5620 
5621  BEGIN_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER
5622  if(pEntry->pxIcon != None)
5623  {
5624  XFreePixmap(pDisp, pEntry->pxIcon);
5625  pEntry->pxIcon = None;
5626  }
5627 
5628  if(pEntry->pxMask != None)
5629  {
5630  XFreePixmap(pDisp, pEntry->pxMask);
5631  pEntry->pxMask = None;
5632  }
5633  END_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER
5634 
5635  pEntry->pxIcon = PXM_GetIconPixmap(idIcon, NULL, &(pEntry->pxMask));
5636 
5637  pEntry->pWMHints->flags |= IconPixmapHint; // (InputHint|StateHint|IconPixmapHint);
5638  if(pEntry->pxMask)
5639  pEntry->pWMHints->flags |= IconMaskHint;
5640  else
5641  pEntry->pWMHints->flags &= ~IconMaskHint;
5642 
5643  pEntry->pWMHints->icon_pixmap = pEntry->pxIcon;
5644  pEntry->pWMHints->icon_mask = pEntry->pxMask;
5645 
5646  BEGIN_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER
5647  XSetWMHints(pDisp, wID, pEntry->pWMHints);
5648  END_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER
5649  }
5650 }

5723 // }
5724  }

5726 
5727 void WBCreateWindowDefaultGC(Window wID, unsigned long clrFG, unsigned long clrBG)
5728 {
5729  XGCValues gcv; /* Struct for creating GC */
5730 
5731  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
5732 
5733  if(!pEntry)
5734  return;
5735 
5736  if(pEntry->hGC)
5737  {
5738  WBFreeGC(pEntry->hGC);
5739  // I shall re-assign this below, no need to NULL it
5740  }
5741 
5742  // the GC's font will be used with regular 'XDrawText' and 'XDrawString' calls
5743  // The associated Font Set must be queried separately for calls to XmbXXX or Xutf8XXX functions
5744 
5745  memset(&gcv, 0, sizeof(gcv));
5746 
5747  gcv.foreground = clrFG;
5748  gcv.background = clrBG;
5749 
5750 // This is what I did before, and it's left commented for future reference
5751 // if(!pEntry->pFontStruct)
5752 // {
5753 // gcv.font = pDefaultFont->fid;
5754 // }
5755 // else
5756 // {
5757 // gcv.font = pEntry->pFontStruct->fid;
5758 // }
5759 
5760 #ifndef NO_DEBUG
5761 #warning does the default GC _REALLY_ need to have a default X11 (legacy) font ID assigned in the XGCValues struct???
5762 #endif // NO_DEBUG
5763  pEntry->hGC = WBCreateGC(pEntry->pDisplay, wID, (/*GCFont |*/ GCForeground | GCBackground), &gcv);
5764 
5765 // TEMPORARY - for debugging a specific problem
5766  if(pEntry->hGC && ((CARD32)pEntry->hGC->values.clip_mask & 0xe0000000))
5767  {
5768  WB_ERROR_PRINT("ERROR: %s - hGC clip_mask is NOT VALID\n", __FUNCTION__);
5769  }
5770 
5771  pEntry->clrFG = clrFG; // cache this info in 'pEntry' as well
5772  pEntry->clrBG = clrBG;
5773 }
5774 
5775 void WBSetWindowDefaultGC(Window wID, WBGC hGC)
5776 {
5777  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
5778 
5779  if(pEntry)
5780  {
5781  if(pEntry->hGC)
5782  {
5783  WBFreeGC(pEntry->hGC);
5784  }
5785 
5786  pEntry->hGC = hGC;
5787 
5788 // TEMPORARY - for debugging a specific problem
5789  if(hGC && ((CARD32)hGC->values.clip_mask & 0xe0000000))
5790  {
5791  WB_ERROR_PRINT("ERROR: %s - hGC clip_mask is NOT VALID\n", __FUNCTION__);
5792  }
5793  }
5794 }
5795 
5796 void WBSetWindowData(Window wID, int iIndex, void *pData)
5797 {
5798  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
5799 
5800  if(pEntry && iIndex >= 0 && iIndex <= WINDOW_DATA_SIZE)
5801  {
5802  pEntry->aWindowData[iIndex] = pData;
5803  }
5804 }
5805

5807 {

5809 
5810  if(pEntry)
5811  {
5812  return(pEntry->hGC);
5813  }
5814 
5815  return(NULL);
5816 }

5818 WBGC WBGetWindowCopyGC(Window wID)
5819 {

5821  WBGC gcRval = 0;
5822 
5823  if(!pEntry)
5824  {
5825  return NULL;
5826  }
5827 
5828 // WB_WARN_PRINT("TEMPORARY: %s - calling WBCopyGC()\n", __FUNCTION__);
5829  gcRval = WBCopyGC(pEntry->hGC);
5830 
5831  return(gcRval);
5832 }

5858 unsigned long WBGetGCFGColor(WBGC gc)

5862 //

5864 // BEGIN_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER
5865 // ret = XGetGCValues(pDisplay, gc, GCForeground, &val);
5866 // END_XCALL_DEBUG_WRAPPER

5869 // {

5916 
5917 
5918 void WBDefaultStandardColormap(Display *pDisplay, XStandardColormap *pMap)
5919 {
5920 XStandardColormap *pMaps = NULL;
5921 XStandardColormap cmap;
5922 Colormap cmDefault;
5923 unsigned long lTemp; //, lWhite = WhitePixel(pDisplay, DefaultScreen(pDisplay));
5924 XColor clrRed, clrGreen, clrBlue;
5925 int i1, nMaps = 0;
5926 
5927 
5928  if(!pMap)
5929  {
5930  return;
5931  }
5932 
5933  if(!pDisplay)
5934  {
5935  pDisplay = WBGetDefaultDisplay();
5936  }
5937 
5938  if(pDisplay == WBGetDefaultDisplay() &&
5939  bStandardColormap)
5940  {
5941  // use the cached structure. faster.
5942 
5943  memcpy(pMap, &cmapDefault, sizeof(cmapDefault));
5944 
5945  return;
5946  }
5947 
5948  bzero(&cmap, sizeof(cmap));
5949 
5950  cmDefault = DefaultColormap(pDisplay, DefaultScreen(pDisplay));
5951 
5952  // TRY to use the APIs to get this information. I mean, REALLY TRY.
5953  if(!XGetRGBColormaps(pDisplay, DefaultRootWindow(pDisplay), &pMaps, &nMaps, XA_RGB_DEFAULT_MAP) ||
5954  nMaps == 0)
5955  {
5956  if(pMaps)
5957  {
5958  XFree(pMaps);
5959  }
5960 
5961  pMaps = NULL;
5962 
5963  if(!XGetRGBColormaps(pDisplay, DefaultRootWindow(pDisplay), &pMaps, &nMaps, XA_RGB_BEST_MAP) ||
5964  nMaps == 0)
5965  {
5966  if(pMaps)
5967  {
5968  XFree(pMaps);
5969  }
5970 
5971  pMaps = NULL;
5972  }
5973  }
5974 
5975  if(pMaps) // meaning that the above 'thingy' actually worked (I never really see it work, though)
5976  {
5977  for(i1=0; i1 < nMaps; i1++)
5978  {
5979  if(pMaps[i1].colormap == cmDefault)
5980  {
5981  memcpy(&cmap, &(pMaps[i1]), sizeof(XStandardColormap));
5982  break;
5983  }
5984  }
5985 
5986  XFree(pMaps);
5987 
5988  cmap.killid = None; // make sure
5989  cmap.visualid = None;
5990 
5991  if(i1 < nMaps) // I broke out of the loop? I found one?
5992  {
5993  if(pDisplay == WBGetDefaultDisplay())
5994  {
5995  memcpy(&cmapDefault, &cmap, sizeof(cmap));
5996  }
5997 
5998  memcpy(pMap, &cmap, sizeof(cmap));
5999  return;
6000  }
6001  }
6002 
6003 // WB_ERROR_PRINT("TEMPORARY: %s no matching XStandardColormap found - creating\n", __FUNCTION__);
6004 
6005  // --------------------------------------------------------
6006  // DERIVE A COLOR MAP FROM RGB COLORS AND KNOWN INFORMATION
6007  // --------------------------------------------------------
6008 
6009  bzero(&clrRed, sizeof(clrRed));
6010  bzero(&clrGreen, sizeof(clrGreen));
6011  bzero(&clrBlue, sizeof(clrBlue));
6012 
6013  clrRed.red = 65535;
6014  clrGreen.green = 65535;
6015  clrBlue.blue = 65535;
6016  XAllocColor(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrRed);
6017  XAllocColor(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrGreen);
6018  XAllocColor(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrBlue);
6019 
6020 // WB_ERROR_PRINT("TEMPORARY: %s red: %08lxH green: %08lxH blue: %08lxH\n", __FUNCTION__,
6021 // clrRed.pixel, clrGreen.pixel, clrBlue.pixel);
6022 
6023  // black is my 'base' pixel.
6024  cmap.base_pixel = BlackPixel(pDisplay, DefaultScreen(pDisplay));
6025 
6026  // next, 'nuke out' how the pixel multipliers work, using the Red, Green, and Blue 'alloc'd colors
6027  if(clrRed.pixel >= clrGreen.pixel && clrRed.pixel >= clrBlue.pixel)
6028  {
6029  if(clrGreen.pixel >= clrBlue.pixel)
6030  {
6031  cmap.blue_max = clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6032  cmap.blue_mult = 1;
6033 
6034  cmap.green_mult = 1;
6035  while(cmap.green_mult < cmap.blue_max)
6036  {
6037  cmap.green_mult <<= 1;
6038  }
6039 
6040  lTemp = (clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6041  cmap.green_max = lTemp / cmap.green_mult;
6042 
6043  cmap.red_mult = cmap.green_mult;
6044 
6045  while(cmap.red_mult < lTemp)
6046  {
6047  cmap.red_mult <<= 1;
6048  }
6049 
6050  cmap.red_max = (clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6051  / cmap.red_mult;
6052  }
6053  else
6054  {
6055  cmap.green_max = clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6056  cmap.green_mult = 1;
6057 
6058  cmap.blue_mult = 1;
6059 
6060  while(cmap.blue_mult < cmap.green_max)
6061  {
6062  cmap.blue_mult <<= 1;
6063  }
6064 
6065  lTemp = (clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6066  cmap.blue_max = lTemp / cmap.blue_mult;
6067 
6068  cmap.red_mult = cmap.blue_mult;
6069 
6070  while(cmap.red_mult < lTemp)
6071  {
6072  cmap.red_mult <<= 1;
6073  }
6074 
6075  cmap.red_max = (clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6076  / cmap.red_mult;
6077  }
6078  }
6079  else if(clrGreen.pixel >= clrRed.pixel && clrGreen.pixel >= clrBlue.pixel)
6080  {
6081  if(clrRed.pixel >= clrBlue.pixel)
6082  {
6083  cmap.blue_max = clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6084  cmap.blue_mult = 1;
6085 
6086  cmap.red_mult = 1;
6087  while(cmap.red_mult < cmap.blue_max)
6088  {
6089  cmap.red_mult <<= 1;
6090  }
6091 
6092  lTemp = (clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6093  cmap.red_max = lTemp / cmap.red_mult;
6094 
6095  cmap.green_mult = cmap.red_mult;
6096 
6097  while(cmap.green_mult < lTemp)
6098  {
6099  cmap.green_mult <<= 1;
6100  }
6101 
6102  cmap.green_max = (clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6103  / cmap.green_mult;
6104  }
6105  else
6106  {
6107  cmap.red_max = clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6108  cmap.red_mult = 1;
6109 
6110  cmap.blue_mult = 1;
6111 
6112  while(cmap.blue_mult < cmap.green_max)
6113  {
6114  cmap.blue_mult <<= 1;
6115  }
6116 
6117  lTemp = (clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6118  cmap.blue_max = lTemp / cmap.blue_mult;
6119 
6120  cmap.green_mult = cmap.blue_mult;
6121 
6122  while(cmap.green_mult < lTemp)
6123  {
6124  cmap.green_mult <<= 1;
6125  }
6126 
6127  cmap.green_max = (clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6128  / cmap.green_mult;
6129  }
6130  }
6131  else
6132  {
6133  if(clrRed.pixel >= clrGreen.pixel)
6134  {
6135  cmap.green_max = clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6136  cmap.green_mult = 1;
6137 
6138  cmap.red_mult = 1;
6139  while(cmap.red_mult < cmap.green_max)
6140  {
6141  cmap.red_mult <<= 1;
6142  }
6143 
6144  lTemp = (clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6145  cmap.red_max = lTemp / cmap.red_mult;
6146 
6147  cmap.blue_mult = cmap.red_mult;
6148 
6149  while(cmap.blue_mult < lTemp)
6150  {
6151  cmap.blue_mult <<= 1;
6152  }
6153 
6154  cmap.blue_max = (clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6155  / cmap.blue_mult;
6156  }
6157  else
6158  {
6159  cmap.red_max = clrRed.pixel - cmap.base_pixel;
6160  cmap.red_mult = 1;
6161 
6162  cmap.green_mult = 1;
6163  while(cmap.green_mult < cmap.red_max)
6164  {
6165  cmap.green_mult <<= 1;
6166  }
6167 
6168  lTemp = (clrGreen.pixel - cmap.base_pixel);
6169  cmap.green_max = lTemp / cmap.green_mult;
6170 
6171 
6172  cmap.blue_mult = cmap.green_mult;
6173 
6174  while(cmap.blue_mult < lTemp)
6175  {
6176  cmap.blue_mult <<= 1;
6177  }
6178 
6179  cmap.blue_max = (clrBlue.pixel - cmap.base_pixel)
6180  / cmap.blue_mult;
6181  }
6182  }
6183 
6184  XFreeColors(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrRed.pixel, 1, 0);
6185  XFreeColors(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrGreen.pixel, 1, 0);
6186  XFreeColors(pDisplay, cmDefault, &clrBlue.pixel, 1, 0);
6187 
6188 // WB_ERROR_PRINT("TEMPORARY: red: %u,%u grn: %u,%u blu: %u,%u\n",
6189 // (unsigned int)cmap.red_max, (unsigned int)cmap.red_mult,
6190 // (unsigned int)cmap.green_max, (unsigned int)cmap.green_mult,
6191 // (unsigned int)cmap.blue_max, (unsigned int)cmap.blue_mult);
6192 
6193  if(pDisplay == WBGetDefaultDisplay())
6194  {
6195  memcpy(&cmapDefault, &cmap, sizeof(cmap));
6196  }
6197 
6198  memcpy(pMap, &cmap, sizeof(cmap));
6199 }
6200 
6201 
6202 WB_FONTC WBQueryWindowFont(Window wID)
6203 {
6204  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
6205 
6206  if(pEntry && pEntry->pFont)
6207  {
6208  return pEntry->pFont;
6209  }
6210 
6211  return NULL;
6212 }
6213 
6214 WB_FONT WBGetWindowFont(Window wID)
6215 {
6216  _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
6217 
6218  if(pEntry && pEntry->pFont)
6219  {
6220  return WBCopyFont(pEntry->pDisplay, pEntry->pFont);
6221  }
6222 
6223  if(!pDefaultFont)
6224  {
6225  WB_ERROR_PRINT("%s - default font is NULL\n", __FUNCTION__);
6226 
6227  return NULL;
6228  }
6229 
6230  return WBCopyFont(pEntry->pDisplay, pDefaultFont);
6231 }
6232

6234 //{
6235 // _WINDOW_ENTRY_ *pEntry = WBGetWindowEntry(wID);
6236 //
6237 // if(pEntry && pEntry->fontSet != None)
6238 // {
6239 // return(pEntry->fontSet);
6240 // }
6241 //
6242 // if(fontsetDefault == None)
6243 // {
6244 // WB_ERROR_PRINT("%s - default font is NULL\n", __FUNCTION__);

6248 //}
6249 
6250 void WBSetWindowClassName(Window wID, const char *szClassName)
6251 {

6253 
6254  if(pEntry)
6255  {
6256  pEntry->szClassName = szClassName;
6257  }
6258 }
